question: How many hours did you sleep per night prior to the Sleep Programme?
name: sleepPerNight

question: How would you have rated your quality of sleep out of ten prior to the programme (0/10 - Worst Quality, 10/10 - Best Quality)?
name: sleepQuality

question: How many hours are you sleeping per night after the Sleep Programme?
name: sleepPerNightAfter

question: How do you rate your quality of sleep out of ten after to the programme (0/10 - Worst Quality, 10/10 - Best Quality)?
name: sleepQualityAfter

question: Would you recommend attending this programme to other people who suffer from poor sleep?
name: recommendProgramme

question: Thinking about your response to this question. Please tell us why you feel this way?
name: whyFeelThisWay

name: benefits

question: Would you recommend this service to friends and family?
name: recommend

question: Please make any comments you would like to make about the programme below. Please include any topics that you feel could be added or removed from the content.
